title: SATWAT
author: SATWAT
content: As Headline showing I have USDT in my account and want to exchange them in Bitcoin we will use Preeve rate with you will pay fees on your end and I will pay from my end. I need 3 mBTC I can send payment in USDT TRC. If you are reputable I have no worries to go first otherwise we can use escrow as well with fees will be share by both of us.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: I have some BTC.If you have not yet got a trade partner and wish to proceed with the transaction, please mention or quote my reply so that I can get a notification.1. Transaction fees, can u cover that, not so huge lately?2. What is your acceptable rate? (this will determine on whether we continue with the exchange or not)

comments.author: SATWAT
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on September 08, 2023, 11:04:25 PMI have some BTC.If you have not yet got a trade partner and wish to proceed with the transaction, please mention or quote my reply so that I can get a notification.1. Transaction fees, can u cover that, not so huge lately?2. What is your acceptable rate? (this will determine on whether we continue with the exchange or not)If fees is no huge then I can cover with you I want to use Preeve rate for more details please give time so we can do this quickly thanks.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: SATWAT on September 09, 2023, 05:09:11 AMIf fees is no huge then I can cover with you I want to use Preeve rate for more details please give time so we can do this quickly thanks.We can do it right now.My address for USDT TRC20 is -->> TNNshyFXVX4gQWBsdTYpGjvnWEc2QuZh3EI will use a fee rate of 16 sats/vbyte which is about 0.00002292 BTC (0.59 USD) based on the current state of the mempool. It should be sufficient to confirm the transaction in the next few blocks (2 or 3)
